name: Soulbound (Wihtikow)
description:
For decades, Myrtlewood Manor has been haunted by evil spirits - now it is time to give them their eternal rest.

Together, you will delve into the depths of this haunted house and light the altar of each of the manor’s five districts. The Soulflame - a manifestation of your sisterly bond - will not only illuminate your path but is the only means to solve puzzles and fight enemies on your way through the spooky manor.

Soulbound is a cooperative 2-player puzzle-action game that was created as a 9-week student project. It features three different enemies with unique behavior and a level with five distinct areas.On top of that, the game has an exclusively composed soundtrack made by Daniel Öst.
